biotools.summary: Takes the output from a TransFac search as input, and finds similarities between groups of promoters in an attempt to simplify the results of transcription factor searches. FASTA/Affymetrix IDs can also be used as input for a local installation of the tool.

bioschemas.name: PromoterPlot
bioschemas.summary: Takes the output from a TransFac search as input, and finds similarities between groups of promoters in an attempt to simplify the results of transcription factor searches. FASTA/Affymetrix IDs can also be used as input for a local installation of the tool.
